00034 
00035 size_t RowInterval::encoded_length() const {
00036   return 2 + encoded_length_vstr(start) + encoded_length_vstr(end);
00037 }
00038 
00039 void RowInterval::encode(uint8_t **bufp) const {
00040   encode_vstr(bufp, start);
00041   encode_bool(bufp, start_inclusive);
00042   encode_vstr(bufp, end);
00043   encode_bool(bufp, end_inclusive);
00044 }
00045 
00046 
00047 void RowInterval::decode(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00048   HT_TRY("decoding row interval",
00049     start = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00050     start_inclusive = decode_bool(bufp, remainp);
00051     end = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00052     end_inclusive = decode_bool(bufp, remainp));
00053 }
00054 
00055 size_t CellInterval::encoded_length() const {
00056   return 2 + encoded_length_vstr(start_row) + encoded_length_vstr(start_column)
00057       + encoded_length_vstr(end_row) + encoded_length_vstr(end_column);
00058 }
00059 
00060 void CellInterval::encode(uint8_t **bufp) const {
00061   encode_vstr(bufp, start_row);
00062   encode_vstr(bufp, start_column);
00063   encode_bool(bufp, start_inclusive);
00064   encode_vstr(bufp, end_row);
00065   encode_vstr(bufp, end_column);
00066   encode_bool(bufp, end_inclusive);
00067 }

00069 
00070 void CellInterval::decode(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00071   HT_TRY("decoding cell interval",
00072     start_row = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00073     start_column = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00074     start_inclusive = decode_bool(bufp, remainp);
00075     end_row = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00076     end_column = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00077     end_inclusive = decode_bool(bufp, remainp));
00078 }

00080 size_t ScanSpec::encoded_length() const {
00081   size_t len = encoded_length_vi32(row_limit) +
00082                encoded_length_vi32(max_versions) +
00083                encoded_length_vi32(columns.size()) +
00084                encoded_length_vi32(row_intervals.size()) +
00085                encoded_length_vi32(cell_intervals.size());
00086   foreach(const char *c, columns) len += encoded_length_vstr(c);
00087   foreach(const RowInterval &ri, row_intervals) len += ri.encoded_length();
00088   foreach(const CellInterval &ci, cell_intervals) len += ci.encoded_length();
00089   return len + 8 + 8 + 1;
00090 }
00091 
00092 void ScanSpec::encode(uint8_t **bufp) const {
00093   encode_vi32(bufp, row_limit);
00094   encode_vi32(bufp, max_versions);
00095   encode_vi32(bufp, columns.size());
00096   foreach(const char *c, columns) encode_vstr(bufp, c);
00097   encode_vi32(bufp, row_intervals.size());
00098   foreach(const RowInterval &ri, row_intervals) ri.encode(bufp);
00099   encode_vi32(bufp, cell_intervals.size());
00100   foreach(const CellInterval &ci, cell_intervals) ci.encode(bufp);
00101   encode_i64(bufp, time_interval.first);
00102   encode_i64(bufp, time_interval.second);
00103   encode_bool(bufp, return_deletes);
00104 }
00105 
00106 void ScanSpec::decode(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00107   RowInterval ri;
00108   CellInterval ci;
00109   HT_TRY("decoding scan spec",
00110     row_limit = decode_vi32(bufp, remainp);
00111     max_versions = decode_vi32(bufp, remainp);
00112     for (size_t nc = decode_vi32(bufp, remainp); nc--;)
00113       columns.push_back(decode_vstr(bufp, remainp));
00114     for (size_t nri = decode_vi32(bufp, remainp); nri--;) {
00115       ri.decode(bufp, remainp);
00116       row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00117     }
00118     for (size_t nci = decode_vi32(bufp, remainp); nci--;) {
00119       ci.decode(bufp, remainp);
00120       cell_intervals.push_back(ci);
00121     }
00122     time_interval.first = decode_i64(bufp, remainp);
00123     time_interval.second = decode_i64(bufp, remainp);
00124     return_deletes = decode_i8(bufp, remainp));
00125 }

00128 ostream &Hypertable::operator<<(ostream &os, const RowInterval &ri) {
00129   os <<"{RowInterval: ";
00130   if (ri.start)
00131     os << "\"" << ri.start << "\"";
00132   else
00133     os << "NULL";
00134   if (ri.start_inclusive)
00135     os << " <= row ";
00136   else
00137     os << " < row ";
00138   if (ri.end_inclusive)
00139     os << "<= ";
00140   else
00141     os << "< ";
00142   if (ri.end)
00143     os << "\"" << ri.end << "\"";
00144   else
00145     os << "0xff 0xff";
00146   os << "}";
00147   return os;
00148 }
00149 
00150 ostream &Hypertable::operator<<(ostream &os, const CellInterval &ci) {
00151   os <<"{CellInterval: ";
00152   if (ci.start_row)
00153     os << "\"" << ci.start_row << "\",\"" << ci.start_column << "\"";
00154   else
00155     os << "NULL";
00156   if (ci.start_inclusive)
00157     os << " <= cell ";
00158   else
00159     os << " < cell ";
00160   if (ci.end_inclusive)
00161     os << "<= ";
00162   else
00163     os << "< ";
00164   if (ci.end_row)
00165     os << "\"" << ci.end_row << "\",\"" << ci.end_column << "\"";
00166   else
00167     os << "0xff 0xff";
00168   os << "}";
00169   return os;
00170 }

00172 
00173 ostream &Hypertable::operator<<(ostream &os, const ScanSpec &scan_spec) {
00174   os <<"\n{ScanSpec: row_limit="<< scan_spec.row_limit
00175      <<" max_versions="<< scan_spec.max_versions;
00176 
00177   if (!scan_spec.row_intervals.empty()) {
00178     os << "\n rows=";
00179     foreach(const RowInterval &ri, scan_spec.row_intervals)
00180       os << " " << ri;
00181   }
00182 
00183   if (!scan_spec.cell_intervals.empty()) {
00184     os << "\n cells=";
00185     foreach(const CellInterval &ci, scan_spec.cell_intervals)
00186       os << " " << ci;
00187   }
00188 
00189   if (!scan_spec.columns.empty()) {
00190     os << "\n columns=(";
00191     foreach (const char *c, scan_spec.columns)
00192       os <<"'"<< c << "' ";
00193     os <<')';
00194   }
00195 
00196   os <<"\n time_interval=(" << scan_spec.time_interval.first <<", "
00197      << scan_spec.time_interval.second <<")\n}\n";
00198   return os;
00199 }

00201 
00202 ScanSpecBuilder::ScanSpecBuilder(const ScanSpec &ss) {
00203   set_row_limit(ss.row_limit);
00204   set_max_versions(ss.max_versions);
00205   set_time_interval(ss.time_interval.first, ss.time_interval.second);
00206   set_return_deletes(ss.return_deletes);
00207 
00208   foreach(const char *c, ss.columns)
00209     add_column(c);
00210 
00211   foreach(const RowInterval &ri, ss.row_intervals)
00212     add_row_interval(ri.start, ri.start_inclusive,
00213                      ri.end, ri.end_inclusive);
00214 
00215   foreach(const CellInterval &ci, ss.cell_intervals)
00216     add_cell_interval(ci.start_row, ci.start_column, ci.start_inclusive,
00217                       ci.end_row, ci.end_column, ci.end_inclusive);
00218 }
